short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BTS Chibi Wallpaper turn new tab to custom Kpop BTS Chibi background. Cute BTS Chibi wallpaper background themes for Kpop fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle BTS Chibi wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Customize your BTS Chibi background by randomizing or favoriting in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Convenient links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access websites quickly.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes easily.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. One-click downloads of wallpapers.
14. Instant access to gaming.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your BTS Chibi new tab.
